info.name: CDAC Community Hub - Complete API Testing
info.description:
Comprehensive Postman collection for testing all microservices in the CDAC Community Hub system.

**Services Covered:**
- Auth Service (8081)
- Food Service (8086)
- Hostel Service (8092)
- Suggestion Service (8096)
- Admin Service (8101)
- API Gateway (8080)

**Setup Instructions:**
1. Import this collection into Postman
2. Set environment variables (see Variables tab)
3. Run 'Auth - Register Admin' and 'Auth - Login Admin' first to get JWT token
4. Token will auto-populate in subsequent requests
5. Test services individually or via API Gateway

**Testing Scenarios:**
- Scenario 1: Direct service access (localhost:PORT)
- Scenario 2: Via API Gateway (localhost:8080/api/SERVICE)
- Scenario 3: Admin dashboard aggregation
- Scenario 4: Inter-service communication
